data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module gives access to a new type of data structures, namely
    Haskell/OCaml-style variants.

    The modules most like this modules are the Data::Iterator,
    Data::Lazy and Data::BinStruct which also represent new, more
    complex, data structures.

    This module is unique because as far as I am aware no module exists
    for Variants and pattern matching, and it represents a, imho, useful
    extension.
